thread.title: Arnie won't be back! Nicole Kidman the queen of the desert for meerkat pals
thread.title_full: Arnie won't be back! Nicole Kidman the queen of the desert for meerkat pals

title: Arnie won't be back! Nicole Kidman the queen of the desert for meerkat pals
text:
Arnie won't be back! Nicole Kidman the queen of the desert for meerkat pals Arnie won't be back! Nicole Kidman the queen of the desert for meerkat pals 
  
Meerkats Sergei and Aleksandr have landed themselves a new squeeze, and it is none other than Hollywood actress Nicole Kidman. 
She is taking over the reins from actor Arnold Schwarzenegger to star in the new advert for comparethemarket.com. Nicole Kidman (Compare The Market) 
The 40-second advert sees some fur flying as Nicole arrives at Aleksandr’s house – to take his meerkat pal Sergei on a date to the movies! 
Sneaky Sergei uses his Meerkat Movies 2 for 1 cinema tickets to take Nicole on the date, leaving Aleksandr outraged. Nicole Kidman stars in the new Meerkat Movies advert (Compare The Market) 
Marketing director of Comparethemarket.com, Mark Vile said: “Arnold Schwarzenegger was always going to be a hard act to follow, but having fellow Hollywood icon Nicole Kidman part of the latest TV ad has certainly exceeded our expectations. We hope Sergei going on a date with Nicole will inspire others to take a friend or partner to the cinema this autumn with Meerkat Movies.” 
Viewers will see the advert for the first time on Sunday October 4 when it airs on ITV at 7:15pm. Share article 
Meerkat Movies offers customers 2 for 1 cinema tickets every Tuesday or Wednesday for a whole year when buying insurance or switching energy with comparethemarket.com. Promoted Stories
